alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 8:41PM PST until January 17 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. * WHERE...Cashmere, Wenatchee, Badger Mountain Road, Moses Lake, Number 1 Canyon, Quincy, Entiat, Number 2 Canyon, Waterville, Mansfield, Brewster, Chelan, Nespelem, Omak, Okanogan, Disautel Pass, Tonasket, Bridgeport, Ephrata, Othello, Oroville, and Pangborn Airport. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
